page.title: 06LEISURE CENTRE,DUMPTON PARK
page.content: The Dumpton Park leisure centre has 4 elements:-a greyhound racing track,a garden centre,a sports centre and a market(open on Fridays in the car park).Being 56 years old the {greyhound track}is the oldest part. There are meetings on Mondays, Wednesdays and Saturdays.The best seats cost Â£1.70 and others are at Â£1.40.50,000 people attend the track annually.The{garden centre}offers all gardening requirements-indoor and out .The{sports centre}offers snooker with 250 members,gymnasium with 600 members,squash with 400 members and a nightclub with 1,500 members.P.E.,keep fit,body shaping and weight training classes are on offer.The{market}holds 400 stalls and attracts 40,000 people annually.The whole complex attracts 750,000 people each year.It is owned by Northern Sports Ltd.
